subject: Tracking SF6045964616380
description_text:
Hello,

Are you able to provide information of which carrier the parcel will be delivered in the UK as well as tracking number for UK please?

I can see that it is due to delivery but I have no information which carrier.

Order number: SSN2920

Thank you,
Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Mateusz,    Your parcel was delivered by Royal Mail. I see it has been delivered, but have you not received it?  https://www.royalmail.com/track-your-item#/tracking-results/IT977547937GB
Hi, Parcel received, thank you :) Kind regards, Matt
